channel.title: BLAZESCAPE HELP NEEDED!( i included pics)
channel.description:
Well im trying to test it out and im trying to find the runserver
are these the runserver? [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2zf52kz.jpg[/img]
cause when i try to run it it says [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/24xnayd.jpg[/img]
PLEASE HELP

item.title: BLAZESCAPE HELP NEEDED!( i included pics)
item.dc:creator: @pluh1 pluh1
item.description:
@pluh1 wrote:

When he says that he means go to My Computer. Right click just in the white space and click properties. There should be a window with a few tabs at the top. Click on the tab for Advanced. Near the bottom there is a button for Environment Variables. Click on that, and it should open a window that looks like this.

Now you’ll want to click this New button as shown in this picture.

Then type in the following:
Variable Name - CLASSPATH
Variable Value - .;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\lib\ext\QTJava.zip
(Though for Variable Value, just type in the .; and then the path to where your java is downloaded. Mine is the path put on there. Hopefully that can guide you to it. If it doesn’t help, I’ll try to explain better.

Read full topic
item.source: BLAZESCAPE HELP NEEDED!( i included pics)
